suppress.notes: Karate does not expose the server docs in armeria-1.20.3.jar which contain the vulnerable package
User input is not deserialized by Karate so the system is not vulnerable to issues with snakeyaml-1.33.jar
The risk caused by Karate using json-smart-2.4.7.jar is a stack overflow, crashing the program which is not a critical issue for the test harness
